resource.description: Optional. The Backup event payload. Unset for deletion events.

Data.title: MetricEvent Event Data
Data.description: The data within all MetricEvent events.

href.description: Link to the resource that has generated the event

type.description: Type of the resource generating the event

uuid.description: Equinix assigned unique identifier of the resource generating the event

name.description: Name of the resource generating the event

state.description: State of the resource generating the event

description.description: Description of the resource generating the event

code.description: Metro code of the source metro generating the event

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Schema of the resource that fired the event

unit.description: Unified Code for Units of Measure

interval.description: The time interval that the metric datapoints refer to

dataPoints.description: Metric data values and end times

startDateTime.description: The start time of the metric data point value given

endDateTime.description: The end time of the metric data point value given

value.description: The value of the metric data point

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.connection.bandwidth_rx.usage
metricNames.description: Connection inbound bandwidth usage in bit/sec

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.connection.bandwidth_tx.usage
metricNames.description: Connection outbound bandwidth usage in bit/sec

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.port.bandwidth_rx.usage
metricNames.description: Port inbound bandwidth usage in bit/sec

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.port.bandwidth_tx.usage
metricNames.description: Port outbound bandwidth usage in bit/sec

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.port.packets_erred_rx.count
metricNames.description: Port inbound erred packets count

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.port.packets_erred_tx.count
metricNames.description: Port outbound erred packets count

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.port.packets_dropped_rx.count
metricNames.description: Port inbound dropped packets count

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.port.packets_dropped_tx.count
metricNames.description: Port outbound dropped packets count

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.connection.packets_dropped_rx_aside_rateexceeded.count
metricNames.description: Connection A side inbound dropped packets count

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.connection.packets_dropped_tx_aside_rateexceeded.count
metricNames.description: Connection A side outbound dropped packets count

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.connection.packets_dropped_rx_zside_rateexceeded.count
metricNames.description: Connection Z side inbound dropped packets count

metricNames.name: equinix.fabric.connection.packets_dropped_tx_zside_rateexceeded.count
metricNames.description: Connection Z side outbound dropped packets count
